deposit(uint256).details: FIX CRIT-3: Added slippage protection against MEV sandwich attacks FIX MED-6: Added solvency check before depositing

emergencyWithdraw().details: FIX MED-5: Sends funds to vault, not owner, in emergencies      Vault funds belong to depositors, not owner

params.owner: Address to check withdrawal limit for

returns._0: Maximum amount that can be withdrawn (limited by Morpho vault liquidity)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updatePricePerShare().details: FIX MED-6: Manually sync price per share for exploit detection      Call this after confirming Morpho vault is healthy

withdraw(uint256).details: FIX CRIT-3: Added slippage protection on withdrawals FIX HIGH-9: Graceful handling if Morpho paused

returns.actualAmount: Actual USDC withdrawn (may differ due to fees/slippage)

withdrawAll().details: FIX HIGH-9: Graceful handling if Morpho paused

currentAPY().notice: Get current APY of the strategy

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit USDC into the underlying protocol

lastKnownPricePerShare().notice: Last known price per share (for exploit detection)

maxWithdraw(address).notice: Get maximum withdrawable amount for an owner

totalAssets().notice: Get total USDC value held by this strategy

updatePricePerShare().notice: Update price per share baseline (owner only)

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw USDC from the underlying protocol
